Treasure Earring (Sapphire, Left Ear, Men)
寶物耳環（藍寶石/左耳/男用)
寶物耳環（藍寶石/左耳/男用)
Treasure Earring (Sapphire, Left Ear, Men)
kDesc
This gem is a sapphire: a variety of corundum that is blue in colour. For the left ear. (Mohs hardness: 9)[#Legal]
Cette pierre est un saphir : une variété de corindon de couleur bleue. Pour l'oreille gauche. (Échelle de Mohs : 9)[#Legal]
Dieser Edelstein ist ein Saphir: eine blaue Korund-Variante für das linke Ohr. (Mohssche Härte: 9) [#Legal]
Questa gemma è uno zaffiro, una varietà di corindone dal colore blu. Orecchio sinistro. (Durezza in scala Mohs: 9)[#Legal]
Esta gema es un zafiro, una variedad de corindón de tono azul. Para la oreja izquierda. (Dureza en la escala de Mohs: 9) [#Legal]
コランダム（鋼玉）の変種で、蒼玉とも呼ばれる青色の宝石。左耳用。（モース硬度９）[#Legal]
코런덤(강옥)의 변종으로, 창옥이라고도 불리는 푸른색의 보석. 왼쪽 귀 전용.(모스 경도9)[#Legal]
This gem is a sapphire: a variety of corundum that is blue in color. For the left ear. (Mohs hardness: 9)[#Legal]
這種藍色的寶石是金剛砂的一種。供左耳用。（摩斯硬度9）[#Legal]
這種藍色的寶石是金剛砂的一種。供左耳用。（摩斯硬度9）[#Legal]
This gem is a sapphire: a variety of corundum that is blue in colour. For the left ear. (Mohs hardness: 9)[#Legal]
